messages.content:
You are tasked with adding English translations to a set of stakeholder quotes. For each quote:
- If the quote is in English, add "N.A." as the translation
- If the quote is in any other language, provide an accurate English translation

Input format is a markdown table with stakeholder names and quotes.
Output should be a markdown table with three columns: name, original quote, and translation.

IMPORTANT RULES:
- Never translate English quotes to English - use "N.A." instead.
- Only and always translate non-English quotes.
- If the original quote, in the third column of the md table is not in english, translate it and add the translation in the 4th column, as described below, but that is only when the quote is not in English.
- Keep original quotes exactly as they are.
- Maintain the markdown table format, without including any horizontal divider lines

Example input:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." |

Example output:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." | "This decision is important." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." | N.A. |

Example input:
| [Person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,eyc..)] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] |

Example output:
| [person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,etc..)] | [Translated Quote] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] | N.A. |

If the input is "None", return "None". if the original quote is not in English, make sure it is translated. Add "N.A" if the quote is already in English.

Input quotes:
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue metals chief executive | "Getting this new industry off the ground will require wisely invested public and private sector funds." |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue metals chief executive | "The whole of industry is calling for bold policy to establish a new green iron industry." |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue metals chief executive | "This week's announcement by the WA government to invest $75m in the NeoSmelt project clearly shows that government shares our view of the importance of establishing this new green industry." |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue metals chief executive | "While a final investment decision on the NeoSmelt project is anticipated in 2026, Fortescue will already be producing high-purity green iron from our pilot plant at Christmas Creek, using green hydrogen." |
| Dr. Andrew Forrest | Fortescue's founder | "Fortescue wants help in the form of approvals and infrastructure." |
| Tim Day | BHP WA iron ore asset president | "You have to start this with something. For us, a gas supply is required. You need that energy initially and then what will happen over time is we'll get to more green energy." |

| Dino Otranto | Fortescue metals chief executive | "Getting this new industry off the ground will require wisely invested public and private sector funds." | N.A. |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue metals chief executive | "The whole of industry is calling for bold policy to establish a new green iron industry." | N.A. |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue metals chief executive | "This week's announcement by the WA government to invest $75m in the NeoSmelt project clearly shows that government shares our view of the importance of establishing this new green industry." | N.A. |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue metals chief executive | "While a final investment decision on the NeoSmelt project is anticipated in 2026, Fortescue will already be producing high-purity green iron from our pilot plant at Christmas Creek, using green hydrogen." | N.A. |
| Dr. Andrew Forrest | Fortescue's founder | "Fortescue wants help in the form of approvals and infrastructure." | N.A. |
| Tim Day | BHP WA iron ore asset president | "You have to start this with something. For us, a gas supply is required. You need that energy initially and then what will happen over time is we'll get to more green energy." | N.A. |
